detail_desc: Blouse in an airy viscose weave with a grandad collar, button placket, 3/4-length sleeves with a tab and button and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with embroidery, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hard plastic smartphone case covered in leather on one side. Fits iPhone 6/6s/7/8.

Striped shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Fishnet tights with an elasticated waist.
Shirt in raw denim with contrasting colour seams, a wide collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, flap chest pockets and a wide tie belt at the waist.

Shirt woven in a stretch cotton blend with a narrow turn-down collar, French front and a yoke and darts at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the physique. Narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves create a flattering silhouette.
